projects.title: Hi There!
projects.description: My name is Md Imran, I'm a front-end developer. I have developed many types of front-ends from  web applications to Ecommerce booking platforms. I'm passionate about cutting-edge, pixel-perfect, beautiful interfaces and intuitively implemented UX.

projects.title: Internet Service Website
projects.description: This project is a showcase of an internet service providing website that was built using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. The website aims to provide information about internet services, packages, and offerings in a user-friendly and visually appealing manner.

projects.title: Travel Website
projects.description: This project is a showcase of a travel website built using React.js and Tailwind CSS, inspired by a design created in Figma. The website serves as a platform for users to explore various travel destinations, view accommodations, and plan their trips. By converting the Figma design into a functional React application, this project demonstrates proficiency in front-end development using modern web technologies.
